title: 김승혁
content:
김승혁은 서울
자연과학대학
수학과
교수이다.
학력
2007.9 ~ 2013.2 Ph.D., Department of mathematics, POSTECH (Advisor: Jaeyoung Byeon)
2004.3 ~ 2007.8 B.E., Department of electrical engineering, POSTECH (double major in mathematics, Summa Cum Raude)
경력
2018.1   ~ 2021.12 Associate member, School of mathematics, KIAS, Republic of Korea
2017.9  ~ 2021.8   Assistant professor, Department of mathematics, Hanyang University, Republic of Korea
2016.11 ~ 2017.8   Research fellow, School of mathematics, KIAS, Republic of Korea (Mentor: Nam-Gyu Kang)
2013.11 ~ 2016.10 Postdoctoral researcher, Facultad de matemáticas, Pontifical catholic university of Chile, Chile (Mentor: Monica Musso)
2013.3   ~ 2013.10 Researcher, Department of mathematical Sciences, KAIST, Republic of Korea (Mentor: Jaeyoung Byeon)
연구관심분야
Existence and asymptotic behaviors of solutions for elliptic equations, especially arising from conformal geometry
Pure variational methods and the Lyapunov-Schmidt reduction method
